author: dain
msg: Added tests and bugs for ServiceMonitorBroadcaster.
o Changed ServiceMonitorBroadcaster to catch Throwable when notifying a monitor
o Fixed typo in ServiceMonitorBroadcaster which caused a monitor to get registered where a set of monitors should have been registered
o Converted assertions to regular checks in KernelErrorsError
o Changed KernelMonitorBroadcasterTest to be array based

author: dain
msg: Fixed bug where a kernel monitor could be double registered.

author: dain
msg: Simplified StandardKernel by splitting out most functionality to delegate classes.
o Moved service monitor registry and event broadcasting out of StandardKernel into ServiceMonitorBroadcaster.
o Moved kernel monitor registry and event broadcasting out of StandardKernel into KernelMonitorBroadcaster.
o Moved service registry out of StandardKernel into ServiceManagerRegistry.
o Added ServiceManagerFactory to reduce the amount of data necessary when creating a ServiceManager.
o Started adding test cases for StandardKernel.
